attributes.action: keep Pimlico School as a community comprehensive school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pimlico School faces the possibility of the imposition of either Academy or Trust status.  There is a strong feeling among stakeholders (parents, staff and students) that neither of these options are appropriate and that it should remain a community comprehensive school.  This petition forms part of their campaign.
